attributes.action: Amend the Transport Act to allow those who receive Lower Rate Mobility component of Disability Living Allowance automatic entitlement to a Disabled Person's Freedom Pass and to clarify the position of those who are mentally disabled on entitlement to a Disabled Person's Freedom Pass and to introduce an Companion Pass to those who need to be accompanied when travelling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition calls for a change in the Transport Act to allow those who receive lower rate mobility component of Disability Living Allowance automatic entitlement to a Disabled Person's Freedom Pass and to clarify that those disabled (including mentally) are already allowed a Disabled Person's Freedom Pass and to introduced a Companion Pass for those who need to be accompanied when travelling, a Companion Pass should have the same benefits as a Disabled Person's Freedom Pass. NB a Disabled Person's Freedom Pass allows free travel at any times on buses, tubes, trams, trains etc in the london area.
